data.text: Having a good reputation [MTY] is better than fine perfume,
It is better to go to a house where people are mourning about someone who has died
It is better to be sad than to be always laughing,
Wise people who go to where others are mourning think about the fact that some day they also will die,
It is better to pay attention to someone who is wise rebuking you
By listening to foolish people laughing
When wise people say to others, “You must pay me a lot of money for me to protect you,”
Finishing something is better than starting something,
Do not quickly ◄lose your temper/react to things angrily►,
Do not say, “Things were a lot better [RHQ] previously,”
Being wise is better than inheriting valuable things;
We are sometimes protected by being wise
Think carefully about what God has done.
When things are going well for you, be happy,
During all the time that I have been alive I have seen a lot of [HYP] things that seem senseless.
So do not think that you are very righteous
If you do what is evil or do what is foolish,
Continue to avoid doing what is evil and doing what is foolish;
If you are wise, you will be more powerful/influential
There is no one in this world who always does what is right
Do not pay attention [IDM] to everything that people say,
You know that you have also cursed other people.
I said to myself that I would use my wisdom to study all the things that I have written about,
Wisdom seems to be far from me;
But I decided to investigate things and
One thing I learned was that ◄allowing a woman to seduce you/having sex with a woman to whom you are not married► is worse than dying.
This is what I have learned:
and I continued to try to learn more,
But I did learn one thing:
